trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_00<tab>Gotoll Ja fidgets anxiously. ※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_01<tab>Gotoll Ja tells you that a researcher from Sharlayan has just arrived to start planting foreign crops in Mamook. He shifts awkwardly and mutters his worries about proper etiquette, so you agree to accompany him to greet the newcomer.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_02<tab>The amiable researcher from Sharlayan, Anggir, is happy to be so warmly welcomed, but she seems concerned by the lack of manpower available in Mamook. In walks Ruvoll Ja, a Mamook native who left his homeland for Tuliyollal years ago. The Doppro cheerfully suggests that using wivres will solve their problems and sallies forth to convince his fellows, but Gotoll Ja's countenance is troubled as he watches the young man depart. Apparently Ruvoll Ja's affability can overcome his coherence during conversation, so Gotoll Ja bids you help him in his negotiations.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_03<tab>Indeed, you arrive to find Ruvoll Ja trying to convince a handful of skeptical Doppro to lend their wivres to a cause they don't fully understand. You may have to fill in the gaps a little before gaining these potential allies.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_04<tab>Ruvoll Ja watches you convince the wivre handlers with awe, and eagerly presents his next errand of persuasion. Kageel Ja is a najool farmer whom he believes will be of help to the gainery with his knowledge of farming crops in this forest.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_05<tab>What might have been a disastrous reunion ends in friendly agreement, and Kageel Ja offers to lend his support. Ruvoll Ja is hopeful that all must be in readiness by now, but it may be good to check with Anggir on that point first.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_06<tab>Anggir bids you bring her materials replete with charcoal so as to balance the acidity of the soil. No stranger to gathering, you venture forth to the Xobr'it Cinderfield for what she requires.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SEQ_07<tab>The wivre handlers see to their charges and Kageel Ja to the fertilizer. Before your eyes the earth is tilled and where once was plain forest now lies a humble gainery. Though modest in scope and barely budding, Gok Golma yet represents the potential Mamook has for change, and with hard work it may indeed become a shining beacon of hope in a forest once oppressed by darkness...
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Anggir.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ruvoll Ja.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_TODO_02<tab>Convince the wivre handlers.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Kageel Ja.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Anggir.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near the Xobr'it Cinderfield)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Anggir)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near the Xobr'it Cinderfield)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Anggir)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Iq Rrax Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Anggir)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, nice to see you. Do you have a moment?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_001<tab>This may not come as a surprise, since you personally helped negotiate our import of foreign crops, but a researcher has recently arrived from Sharlayan.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_002<tab>I've a mind to go and pay my respects, but...
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_003<tab>Well, I know little about Sharlayans, and I'm worried I'll cause offense. Could you come along, if only for my peace of mind?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_004<tab>My thanks. Her name is Anggir, and she should be in the southern district of the city.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_010<tab>This must be her. I'm humbled she'd travel so far for our sakes.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_020<tab>Hello there. May I be of assistance?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_021<tab>And I'm Gotoll Ja, former mercenary. Now I fashion whatever odds and ends need making.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_022<tab>The Autarch says you've come to oversee the growth of new crops here in Mamook, so we wanted to express our gratitude.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_023<tab>That's very kind of you. My name is Anggir, and it's my pleasure to be at your service.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_024<tab>When I first heard my assignment, I was intrigued. A forest dominated by the aetheric influence of meteorites...
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_025<tab>Rest assured, we shall soon have an experimental gainery up and running. New crops will flourish here, this I promise.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_027<tab>Indeed, my chief concern at the moment is not one of potential, but one of manpower. Mamook is rather sparse in population, is it not?

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_028<tab>Yes, most of our able-bodied workers have left, either to become mercenaries or, er...for other reasons. I myself would be glad to help, but I doubt one extra body will count for much.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_030<tab>(-???-)You should use wivres! Put to the right use, our wivres can solve about any problem!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_031<tab>Ruvoll Ja! How many years has it been? I thought you had moved to Tuliyollal for good!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_032<tab>When I heard change was in the air for Mamook, I had to come and see it for myself.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_033<tab>Using wivres sounds like an excellent idea. We could hitch them to plows, have them cart heavy equipment...
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_034<tab>All we need now is someone willing to gather extra materials we require.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_036<tab>I know a few gatherers, but most are getting on in years. We'll have to find an adventurous soul if you need anything more than local mushrooms or the odd medicinal herb.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_037<tab>I handle beasts, not ore and timber. You?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_Q1_100_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A1_100_001<tab>I'm an adventurous gatherer─leave it to me!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A1_100_002<tab>For the right price, I'll handle just about anything.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_039<tab>Then it's settled! You'll be well compensated, I promise.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_090_039<tab>I look forward to working with you, friend!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_100_039<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Ruvoll Ja, you both have my thanks.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_040<tab>Think nothing of it! I'll gather what wivre handlers I can find and explain the situation. I'm sure they'll be happy to help as well!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_043<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you mind going with Ruvoll Ja? He's a good lad, but he gets ahead of himself sometimes.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_GOTOLLJA_000_044<tab>You've more than proven your talent for communication, so if he's struggling to make his point, lend him a hand, would you?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_050<tab>I appreciate your cooperation. I'll be here planning the particulars if you need anything.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROA05255_100_050<tab>My wivre's trained for battle. I doubt it'll be much use on a farm...
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROB05255_110_050<tab>Remind me why we're here again?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROC05255_120_050<tab>My darling has <var 1A 02 /var>needs<var 1A 01 /var>! I won't force him to do work he doesn't enjoy!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_060<tab>As I've been saying, wivres are the answer!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROA05255_000_061<tab>...But ours are specifically trained for combat. How do you reckon they'd help with farming?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_062<tab>Oh <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, perfect timing. Tell them one wivre's worth a least ten men on the field, won't you?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>The wivre handlers stand in awkward silence. Try convincing them on behalf of Ruvoll Ja.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_070<tab>I'm not wrong, am I?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>An awkward silence lingers. Try speaking on behalf of Ruvoll Ja.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROA05255_000_080<tab>Believe me, we all want new crops here in Mamook. I'm happy to help─I just want to know how a wivre trained for battle could be useful.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A1_000_001<tab>We need wivres to haul equipment.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A1_000_002<tab>We need wivres to pull our plows.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROA05255_000_081<tab>I see...a wivre with the strength for combat should have no problems with that. Very well, the both of us will be over presently.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROB05255_000_090<tab>What does he expect our wivres to do, exactly? Hoe with their horns?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A2_000_001<tab>More like pull heavy plows.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A2_000_002<tab>Gotoll Ja will outfit them with farming equipment.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROB05255_000_091<tab>That...makes far more sense. If that's what you need done, we can do it.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROB05255_100_091<tab>Oh, that makes far more sense. I can trust Gotoll Ja's handiwork, so count me in.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROC05255_000_100<tab>My precious wivre <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> smashes things. I'd love to be of service, but if my darling can't smash something to bits, then I'm afraid we're at an impasse.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A3_000_001<tab>How about smashing rocks?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A3_000_002<tab>How about smashing trees?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROC05255_000_101<tab>That sounds...well, smashing! Leave it to me and my wivre─we'll have the garden beds free of obstructions in a blink.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_110<tab>That was incredible! You convinced them all to help just like that.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_111<tab>Now, there's one last person I think we need.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_112<tab>His name is Kageel Ja and he's a najool─er, Ja Tiika banana farmer. We can trust his expertise.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_120<tab>This is Kageel Ja. We've been best friends since childhood, but... Well, after I moved to Tuliyollal, we haven't had much contact.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_130<tab>...You were part of the Third Promise's retinue, weren't you? What brings you here now? And with Ruvoll Ja?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_131<tab>We just met, actually. A researcher from afar is beginning work on a gainery here, and we're both lending a hand.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_136<tab>I was hoping you might help out as well, knowing as much as you do about farming in these forests.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_137<tab>You think I'd aid a traitor who abandoned his homeland for the comforts of Tuliyollal?

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_138<tab>...Pffft, the look on your face! I'm kidding, I'm kidding. Although it's in great part thanks to this <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> here that such words can be said in jest. Much has changed for Mamook.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_139<tab>If my best friend has finally come home, I'd be a fool to refuse his pleas.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_141<tab>Joking aside, your words didn't ring hollow, Kageel Ja. To many, I was a traitor to everything Mamook once stood for. ...A traitor to my friend for never writing.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_100_141<tab>It broke my heart to leave, but I couldn't stand the zealotry of blessed siblings... Now that the old teachings have been left in the past, I want to do everything I can for Mamook's future.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_110_141<tab>Thank you, Kageel Ja, for your forgiveness. I hope that you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and I can help find a new way forward.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_143<tab>All right, hopefully we have enough people to get started! Let's go and ask Anggir if she needs anything else.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_180<tab>Gotoll Ja is helping outfit the wivres with carts and plows. They'll be along afterwards.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_181<tab>I just introduced myself to Anggir. Let me know how I can help.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_190<tab>Thank you for your aid in recruiting the others. With a handful of wivres, our worker shortage is now but a trifle.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_191<tab>The handlers have their orders, but there's one thing I would yet ask of you.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_192<tab>While fertile, this soil needs some additions to better accommodate the seeds and starters I've brought with me.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_200<tab>I think some charcoal should balance out its acidity nicely. Perhaps you could bring some from the Xobr'it Cinderfield?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_210<tab>I think some charred bark should balance out its acidity nicely. Perhaps you could bring some from the Xobr'it Cinderfield?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_220<tab>I think a cindershell should balance out its acidity nicely. Perhaps you could bring us one from Iq Rrax Tsoly?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_221<tab>According to local fishers, golden stonefly nymphs should serve you well as bait.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_100_221<tab>I've attained the proper permissions from Iq Br'aax to gather from the Ut'ohmu Horizon. As long as your work is done respectfully, we have nothing to fear.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_230<tab>We'll begin setting up a base of operations in the meantime, so let me know once you've acquired what we need.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_240<tab>It's a relief to have Kageel Ja work with us. He's been growing najool forever, so he and Anggir should be unstoppable!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_241<tab>Preparing the land before planting is an incredibly important step. If we have any hope for our new seedlings, we should take pains to do it properly.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_250<tab>Welcome back. I trust you have what I asked for?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_251<tab>Perfect, just what I had hoped. I'll have the wivre handlers mix our fertilizer into the soil as they till it.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_DOPPROD05255_000_300<tab>Cart's secure. We're ready when you are.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_301<tab>Just about... Yes, this should be ground finely enough to distribute evenly.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_302<tab>Once we've tilled the soil for beds, we can begin planting in earnest. Ruvoll Ja, can I count on your continued support?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_303<tab>Me? But Kageel Ja's the one who grows things.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_304<tab>And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> have grown our hopes into a viable operation by recruiting the necessary allies. Charisma like yours is essential for this gainery's success.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_306<tab>All right, I'll do what I can. On my pride as a Mamool Ja─for Mamook!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_307<tab>Your assistance would be invaluable, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if you can spare the time.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_309<tab>After all these years, my homestead is about to realize true progress. I would love to have you with us as we build a brighter future for my people.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A5_000_001<tab>I'll help. On my pride as an adventurer─for Mamook!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_A5_000_002<tab>When you put it that way, I can't really say no.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_320<tab>Thank you. I'm in your debt!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_330<tab>I know I'm asking a lot of you. I'm truly grateful.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_340<tab>It's heartening to have you with us.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_KAGEELJA_000_341<tab>Sorry for the wait. The wivres are ready.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_342<tab>Thanks, Kageel Ja. Let's get started!
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_RUVOLLJA_000_400<tab>This gainery will give Mamook another chance. I can just feel it.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_401<tab>I can feel it too. Let's show the world what these lands can grow.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_ANGGIR_000_402<tab>Together, by our own hands.

TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>From hopes yet to fully blossom, Mamook has established a gainery! Help the Mamool Ja come to love the land that supports them by aiding the farmers of Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SYSTEM_000_450<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Friendly<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the farmers of Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SYSTEM_000_451<tab>Mamool Ja society quests are now available from Kageel Ja in Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM001_05255_SYSTEM_000_452<tab>Furthermore, you may now purchase wares from Veerul Ja.
